price: Na kwamba Yeye ndiye aliye waangamiza A'di wa kwanza,
footnotes: Na Yeye ndiye aliye wateketeza kina A'di wa mwanzo, kaumu ya Nabii Hudi. Na akawateketeza Thamudi, kaumu ya Nabii Saleh. Hakuwabakisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
